title: [Large-Scale] SNS-Based Self-Directed Science Learning Game Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Program emphasizing self-directed learning environments using SNS platforms and gamification elements for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more scientific problem-solving strategies in SNS-based game environments.
Learners can perform knowledge-sharing activities with peers two or more times using in-game collaboration tools.
Learners can create self-assessment reports based on the game feedback system
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
